articles.title: The best photos and videos of the April 8 total solar eclipse over North America - Livescience.com
articles.description: Millions of viewers across Mexico and North America are witnessing a historic total solar eclipse. Here are some of the best photos from the day.
articles.content:
On April 8, 2024, a total solar eclipse
 drew its enormous shadow over North America, cutting a 115-mile-wide (185 kilometers), 10,000-mile-long (16,000 km) path of sudden darkness across the contin… [+5134 chars]

articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: First non-American on the Moon will be a Japanese astronaut, says Biden - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: A lucky Japanese astronaut will become the first non-American to set foot on the Moon during one of NASA's upcoming Artemis missions, US President Joe Biden announced Wednesday.
articles.content: A lucky Japanese astronaut will become the first non-American to set foot on the Moon during one of NASA's upcoming Artemis missions, US President Joe Biden announced Wednesday. The offer to Japan --… [+3382 chars]
